short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the 'Add Reaction' button from Gmail™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension does one simple thing: It removes the "Add Reaction" button you may see in Gmail™.

No need to worry about mistakenly reacting to a professional email anymore!

Source code: https://github.com/evowizz/De-Gmojify
